description: Try our easy to follow Silverside With Herb Sauce And Warm Bean Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Corned beef,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Winter,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Slow cooker,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Silverside With Herb Sauce And Warm Bean Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place silverside into the bowl of a 5L slow cooker. Add the basil (stalks and leaves), the parsley (stalks and leaves), garlic, onion, celery, bay leaves, vinegar and peppercorns. Cover with 5 cups water and season with 2 tsp salt.
Cover with lid. Cook for 41/2 hours on high or 7 hours on low, or until beef is tender. Remove the beef and rest, lightly covered with foil, for 5 minutes.

Meanwhile, for the herb sauce, place half bunch flat-leaf parsley, half bunch basil 2tbs white wine vinegar, 80ml extra virgin olive oil, 50g capers and 2 tsp dijon mustard in a small food processor. Season and blitz to a rough paste. Toss half of the salsa verde through the blanched green beans and cannellini beans.
Slice meat, then top with extra salsa verde. Serve with the warm bean salad and garnish with extra basil leaves.
